code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Hero.css';import LinkedInIcon from'@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero6=()=>{const[showEmail,setShowEmail]=useState(false);const toggleEmail=()=>{setShowEmail(!showEmail);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleEmail,className:"button contact",children:showEmail?'Hide Email':'Show Email'})}),showEmail&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Email: sarvagya [at] berkeley [dot] edu"})]});};export default Hero6;
